# Lesson Plan: Machine Learning

Basic intermediate level introduction to Machine Learning

This lesson is designed for your current knowledge level (intermediate) and will take approximately 60 minutes.

## Learning Objectives
By the end of this lesson, you will be able to:
• Understand the key concepts of Machine Learning
• Apply basic knowledge of Machine Learning in simple scenarios

Let's begin with the first activity. Say 'next' when you're ready to proceed, or ask questions at any time.
